data.title: QSL Information Pages
data.text:
6160 kHz, St Johns NF 31.12.82 07.02.83 38 days, QSL : kort info v/s : D Uttaro G.Nilsson-S direct to QIP Feb 83 CKZN St. John´s, 6160 kHz verified with a det. Card in 108 days. P.Robic-AUT direct to QIP Dez 91 6160 CKZN finally replied in 15 months with a full data QSL folder and sticker. After 2 follow ups via mail, 3 follow ups via FAX and even a fresh report were not successful, I phoned the station and spoke to Mr. Jerry Brett in their transmitter department. A FAX to his attention (709) 576-5099 yielded the QSL 3 weeks later, v/s S. Williams. Glad to finally close the chapter on this one ! G.Maroti-NY-USA Cumbre DX 166 Nov 97 6160 CKZN I received 2 full data QSL folders on the same day for follow-up reports over a year old. The dates indicated on the card were the dates of my follow-up letters, not the date of reception. Interesting because they verified 7 months prior, when I spoke to their transmitter engineer. Looks like either they're cleaning out the in-basket, or were waiting for the QSL folders to arrive from the printers as these are different from the one I received prior. G.Maroti-NY-USA Cumbre DX 194 Jun 98 CKZN St. John's, Newfoundland (6160 kHz) -QSL folder describing history of Newfoundland and Labrador, along with a form letter, in 18 months, signed by Shawn Williams, Manager, Transmission and Distribution. This is without a follow-up for a report dated 12 / 3/96 ! E.Bueneman-MO-USA TFW 063 Jun 98 6160 CKZN received three QSLs in two weeks time for a log from a month ago, a log last year, and one from January 1996 ! They must be catching up on old mail. L.Silvi-OH-USA Cumbre DX 197 Jul 98 CKZN 6160 St Johns. Folder QSL, Air in 2 weeks for USD. FD on card plus sent list of CBC Network stations. v/signer Shawn Williams. J.Wright-NSW-AUS Cumbre DX 198 Jul 98 CKZN St. John's on 6160, QSL folder and sticker in just 17 days. Sent some mint Canadian mints which were returned so they obviously don't require return postage. v/s Elaine James for Shawn R. Williams, P. Eng., Manager, Transmission + Distribution. A.Skalmeraas-NOR direct to QIP Jul 98 6160, CKZN, St. John's, hrd on May 28, power 1 kw, full-data folder signed by S. Williams on June1, 1998. -This station is on CBC Newfoundland Network.- Address : CBC Transmission + Distribution Dept., P.O. Box 12010, Station A, St. John's, NF A1B 3T8, Canada, - http://www.radio.cbc.ca -. The CBC also b / cs on 31 FM xmtrs ranging in power from 100 watts to 20 kw.- V.G.Titarev-UKR Numero Uno 1486 Jul 98 CKZN 6160 kHz, det. qsl-card in 14 days, sticker, info, IRC back R.Sonntag-D direct to QIP Jul 98 CKZN St. John's / NF - Yeah ! A nice QSL folder reached me for my report in English after only 15 days. They returned the enclosed IRC. D.H.Friese-D direct to QIP Aug 98 CKZN-St. John's, nice folder card, different from earlier versions, as others have noted. Green map of Newfoundland + Labrador, and Canada and N.Am, on front, with -CBC-SRC-; history inside; full-data (except time) on back. Power penned in as 1 kw. Also sticker, and nice -Dear DXer- form letter listing all CBC Newfoundland stns, v/s on both ltr and card is Shawn R. Williams [signed -for him- by Elaine James on ltr], P. Eng., Mgr, Transmission + Distribution, address as per Titarev in Numero Uno 1486 - July 1998. In two wks. for taped rpt. Returned $ 1. J.Berg-MA-USA Numero Uno 1487 Aug 98 CKZN 6160, f /d " Map " card, sticker and list of local AM and FM stations in 512 days from v/s Shawn Williams. M.Humenyk-ON-CAN CIDX 1998-10 Okt 98 CKZN / 6160 kHz, 17 days, qsl-card / IRC (returned). G.Opalka-D ADDX 1998-21 Nov 98 CKZN / 6160 kHz, 45 days, det. qsl-card, list of CBC-Stn. C.Terhorst-D ADDX 1998-21 Nov 98 CKZN 6160, P / D " Map of Newfoundland & Labrador " card, form letter and slicker in 2 weeks for ms (returned) from v/s S. Williams. A.Loudell-DE-USA CIDX 1998-12 Dez 98 CKZU Vancouver 6160, f /d " CBC Building " card in 16 days from v/s Dave Newbury for ms. A.Loudell-DE-USA CIDX 1998-12 Dez 98 CKZN / 6160 kHz 12 days detailed qsl card qsl letterInfo / IRC (zurnck). R.Sonntag-D ADDX 1999-06 Mrz 99 CKZN St. John's / 6160 kHz, 66 days, detailed qsl-card, / IRC. H.-J.Koch-D ADDX 1999-23 Dez 99 CKZN St.Johns 6160 180 days, Letter v/s Shawn William A.Gupta-IND UDXL-India Webpage Dez 99 CKZN St. John's, qsl-card, 6160 kHz, 19.05.01, 30 days, v/s : Regional Engineer Shawn Williams rep from IRL I.Zhurkin-RUS direct to QIP Jun 01 CKZN : Fuer einen Bericht vom 17. April 1999 (6160kHz) kam am 16.Juli 2001 die voll korrekte Bestätigung mit Frequenz- und Senderstandorteliste. H.Meixner-AUT A-DX-ML Jul 01 CKZN : Ich hatte - Martins Rat folgend - per e-Mail ein f/up geschickt und bekam auch heute QSL+Brief+Sticker+IRC zurück. Nach einem Blick in den "Sent" Ordner und auf den Poststempel stellte ich allerdings fest, daß sich f/up und QSL überkreuzt haben. M.Zwoch-D A-DX-ML Jul 01 CKZN : Vielen Dank im Namen aller, die keinen Reminder geschickt haben und trotzdem in den Genuss der Antwort gekommen sind (Falt-QSL, Formbrief, Aufkleber), wie ich zum Beispiel! Offensichtlich hat man dort jetzt jemanden zum QSLling abgestellt, ich habe den Brief heute erhalten. Ich hatte einen IRC beigelegt, der nicht wieder zurückkam.. macht nix, ich wollte ja die QSL.. K.-U.Hoefs-D A-DX-ML Jul 01 CKZN : vor Kurzem beklagten einige OMs wegen dem mangelnden Postruecklauf von CKZN aus St. John's, Neufundland. Nach einem Bericht vom 17. Mai 2001 und einem freundlichen reminder per e-mail vor ca. 2 Wochen (tnx Martin fuer die e-mail Adresse) kam heute die QSL (Falt-) Karte mit allen Details. Interessant: Der Brief enthielt noch eine weitere QSL fuer Berichte aus Februar 1999, Juli 1999 und November 1999. 4 IRC's wurden zurueckgeschickt! Ein beigelegter Formbrief listet alle AM & FM Sender der CBC in Neufundland und Labrador auf, unterzeichnet von Elaine Ames (oder James?) "for Shawn R. Williams". In meinem reminder hatte ich nur auf den 2001'er Bericht hingewiesen, nicht auf die Berichte aus 1999. U.Volk-D A-DX-ML Jul 01 NEWFOUNDLAND CKZN, St. John's 6160 kHz (power 1 kw), received today full QSL card and sticker for my report of 02. feb 2001, after follow up and registered letter (+ 1$); v/s Shawn Williams, addr. CBC Transmission & Distribution Dept., P.O.Box 12010, Station A, St. John's, NF A1B 3T8, Canada D.Canonica-SUI A-DX-ML Jul 01 Vandaag vielen twee mooie Newfoundland QSL's van CKZN-CBC R 1 in de bus (6160 kHz). Een voor mijn rapport van 2 december 2000 en een voor dat van 10 februari 2001. Beide kwamen hier aan in één enveloppe. Verder ook twee begeleidende standaardbrieven en twee stickers. Power : 1 KW, v/s Shawn Williams. G.Schotmans-BEL Benelux-DX-Club-ML Jul 01 6160 CKZN St.Johns full-data QSL folder signed by Shawn Williams, Regional Engineer, a CBC sticker, and a list of high-power AM & FM stations in Newfoundland. Received in 233 days (nearly 8 months), no follow-up. R.Stewart-MO-USA Cumbre DX 356 Jul 01 F/D folding card signed by Shawn Williams for request sent in March 2000. 478 days. No RP or follow up requests. J.Miller-USA Cumbre DX 356 Jul 01 6160 CKZN from St. Johns heard 4 December 1999 at 0857-0908. SI=11. Dandy CBC/SCR Newfoundland & Labrador QSL + letter + sticker +return of my 2 IRCs + my cash gifts in 592 days (my longest wait). Responding to my original mail report + 6 mail reminders + FAX + Email. Well worth the effort and wait! G.Glotzbach-NM-USA Cumbre DX 357 Jul 01 CKZN St. John's 6160 kHz. Full data QSL folder, sticker, list of CBC AM/FM stations, after 64 days for RR + 1 IRC (returned!). V/s Shawn Williams. U.Volk-D direct to QIP Jul 01 CKZN-St. John's NF, 6160 kHz, mint stamps (returned), 754 days, v/s Shawn Williams, sticker, info, PO Box 12010, Station 'A', St. John's, NF A1B 3T8. Nice QSL folder - worth the wait. J.Weston-G direct to QIP Jul 01 CKZN Shawn Williams - He must have sent out a batch. Received the same for a report sent earlier this year, along with a CBC sticker, and a list of all CBC transmitters in Newfoundland. W.Salmaniw-CAN DXplorer-ML Jul 01 6160 CANADA, St. John's, NF, CKZN, rec. full detailed QSL card in 1 mo after follow up. I now have all the regional SW stations QSL'd from Canada. Thanks to Walt for the info that Vancouver was off the air at the time. I have been after this for many years. v/s: Shawn Williams-Eng. Address: CBC, P.O. Box 12010, Station A, St. John's NF A1B 3T8, Canada, also send sked, listing all their other MW & FM stations. I am really pleased with this. P.Martin-OR-USA HCDX-ML Jul 01 6160 kHz CKZN, 1kW, in 27months, with card, CBC sticker and letter, v/s Shawn Williams who has been a busy man recently D.Norrie-NZL HCDX-ML Jul 01 CKZN St. John's, p/d QSL, px schedule and sticker after 98d. V/s Shawn Williams E.Gehrig-E HCDX-ML Jul 01 6160 CKZN, St.Johns f/d card CBC/SRC Newfoundland & Labrador with a letter listing CBC Radio broadcast freq. in Newfoundland and a sticker in only 818 days !! Claude mentions that it took over 2 years and I live only 200 kms from St. Johns, At lease I got a new sticker for my collection. C.Squire-CAN ODXA 2001-08 Aug 01 CKZN St. John´s NF 6160 k inf sti 14d. v/s Shawn R. Williams T.-H.Ekblom-DNK Norwegian DX News 2001-06 Sep 01 CKZN St Johns NF 6160 kHz, flyer, rp : 1, 869 days. Adress on QSL: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Transmission & Distribution Department, P.O.Box 12010, Station A, St.John's, NF A1B 3T8, Canada D.van der Knaap-HOL direct to QIP Okt 01 6160 - CKZN, Saint John's, Newfoundland - 90 dias. Recebido cartão QSL próprio da emissão regional da CBC (QSL folder full data com a história da regi ão da Terra Nova-Newfoundland), adesivo, schedule nacional e regional. Potência de 1 kW. v/s: Keith Durnford, Supervisor QTH : PO Box 12010, Station A, Saint John's, NF A1B 3T8, Canada Enviada gravação da transmissão em CD. Apenas como curiosidade, vale dizer que foi em St. John's que Marconi recebeu a primeira transmissã o sem fio através do Atlântico em 1901. Escuta realizada em Wenceslau Braz-MG C.Fernandes Lopes-MG-B Atividade-DX 113 Sep 02 6160 - CKZN, St. John's (Newfoundkland) - 46 dias. Recebido QSL tipo folder com a história de Newfoundland, uma carta de agradecimento mostrando que o único transmissor de Ondas Curtas de Newfoundland é esse de 6160 kHz, adesivo e guia de frequencias da CBC Radio. V/S: Keith Durnford Relatório de recepção enviado por email (radiomgt[ät]stjohns.cbc.ca) com minha foto e arquivo de som de Real Audio com um pouco mais de 4 minutos de gravação. M.Toniolo dos Anjos-NY-USA Atividade-DX 115 Sep 02 CKZN, 6160 Khz: conferma con QSL+lettera+adesivo in 33 giorni. QTH: CBC Newfoundland and abrador, P.O. BOX 12010, Station A, St. John's, NF A1B 3T8, CANADA. v/s: Keith Durnford. (via D.Monferini) R.Celestre-I Play-DX-ML Mrz 03 CKZN, 6160, f/d QSL folderw/ power, "1Kw", sticker, CBC MW/FM freuency guide and friendly letter listing Newfoundland High Power MW and FM station in 38 ds. v/s Keith Durnford, Transmission Supervisor. M.Humenyk-ON-CAN CIDX 2005-02 Feb 2005 Today the mailman brought me an envelope containing 3 QSL's from RCI (Radio Canada International) for broadcasts heard on 1, 3 and 13 January. The reception reports were all sent as one Email and the signer was Bill Westenhaver, who if I recall correctly has been a LONG TIME signer of QSL's from RCI. Also in the envelope was a variety of bumper stickers, pennants, radio schedules etc. Incidentally, the 1 January 2005 Logging was for a 1830 UT broadcast on 13790. After sending the report I received an Email from Bill asking for confirmation of the frequency as that one wasn't in use. A later reply indicated that the engineers were running it as an unannounced "test" frequency. Could that be read as a "boo boo" (grin)? He sent a "different" QSL showing the Sackville "antenna farm" for that logging.
